item.description:
Beethoven's Ninth Symphony

FREE

MEET IN THE LOBBY AT 7:30 sharp please. We are a large group, this can be tricky in a crowd as it is sure to be. We may need to break up in smaller groups inside. New folks, don't be shy, look for familiar faces from our pictures.  Look for Dal, Ray and Gabriele.

8:00 PM
Yale Philharmonia

Strauss: Fanfare für die Wiener Philharmoniker; Beethoven: LeonoreOverture No. 3; Beethoven: Symphony No. 9, with the Yale Glee Club, Yale Camerata, and soloists from Yale Opera.

  Parking is free on the street after 7:00, also the Yale lot on temple Street across from the library is free and open to the public after 4:30

 

Coffee before hand at Blue State Coffee anyone? Meet at 6:45 - 7:20

Okay...I have a table reserved at Blues State for 6:45 - 7:20 for 16 people, thats about all that responded, so my assumption is the remainder meet at Woolsey Hall for the performance.  If you decide to show up at Blue State at this point, without having let us know, you may have to stand, no guarantees.

 

Blue State Coffee

84 Wall Street, New Haven, CT 06511

Phone: (203) 764-2632
item.how_to_find_us: meet Dal, Ray and Gabriele in the front lobby, Dal has the bw scarf.
item.name: Beethoven's Ninth Symphony
